mapper.select: SELECT p.title,p.price,p.image,s.sharer,s.sharetime FROM t_share AS s JOIN t_product AS p ON s.proid = p.id WHERE uid = #{uid} ORDER BY s.sharetime DESC
SELECT DISTINCT friendname FROM t_friend WHERE uid = #{uid};
SELECT url, COUNT(*) AS num FROM t_log WHERE times >= #{start} AND times <= #{end} GROUP BY url ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT 0,3
